text: "Live Like Horses" is a 1996 song by Elton John featuring Luciano Pavarotti. It was the second track from his 21st studio album The Big Picture and went to number 9 in the United Kingdom and number 74 in the Netherlands. ==Track listings== Europe CD 1 # "Live Like Horses" (studio version) – 5:10 # "Live Like Horses" (Live Finale version) – 5:03 # "I Guess That's Why They Call It The Blues" (live) – 4:42 # "Live Like Horses" (Elton John solo studio version) Europe CD 2 # "Live Like Horses" (studio version) # "Live Like Horses" (Live Finale version) # "Step into Christmas" # "Blessed" ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Pop songs
title: Live Like Horses
